page.title: 04LIFE STYLES IN ARNPRIOR
page.content: The life style of the people of Arnprior and the surrounding area, while rural, is in no sense remote. Almost all families have, or have access to, at least one motor car and travel easily to the neighbouring villages or, more typically to Stirling.(There is also a regular bus service.) Shopping for major supplies,for clothing etc. is normally done in Stirling with farmers and their wives traditionally going to town on market day(Thursday). In recent times one major shopping expedition per week or per month has become common. Similarly many people now travel to Stirling or Glasgow to work, and most families have at least one member whose employment is outside the immediate area.
